document_data.name: Zomara
document_data.mainbody: '''Zomara''' was a [[drow]] [[cleric]] working with the slaver ring undercover in the [[Oasis of the White Palm]] in [[Raurin]] in the {{YearlinkName|1356}}.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|79}}
document_data.History: Zomara rested in a room underneath the [[Sandvoyagers' Guild]], inside a ruin known as the [[Temple of Set]]. She had a weighed net at the entrance, and kept eight [[spider]]s as servants.
document_data.Possessions:
Zomara had a [[mace]], [[chain mail]], and a small [[shield]]; all of these were very powerfully enchanted. She wore ''[[boots of elvenkind]]'' and a ''[[cloak of elvenkind]]'', which eased her avoidance of fire-based attacks. All of her equipment would become useless if exposed to sunlight.

Inside her pillow, Zomara kept ten [[gem]]s, each of which was worth 50 [[gold piece]]s, five gems worth 100 gp, and one gem worth 5000 gp.
